ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cloves,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, 2  ripe persimmons, pureed, 1 large egg, 1 cup chopped walnuts
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 6%, Saturated Fat 2g 10%, Cholesterol 12mg 4%, Sodium 88mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 12g 4%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 6g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 1mg 5%, Calcium 7mg 1%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 30mg 1%
